verses.roman:
jalayantra-dhārā yaiche vahe aśru-jala
āśa-pāśe loka yata bhijila sakala

synonyms: jala-yantra—from a syringe; dhārā—pouring of water; yaiche—as if; vahe—are flowing; aśru-jala—tears from the eyes; āśa-pāśe—on all sides; loka—people; yata—as many as there were; bhijila—become wet; sakala—all.
translation: Tears came forcefully from the eyes of the Lord, as if from a syringe, and all the people surrounding Him became wet.
